text: This subtitle shall not affect actions or proceedings, civil or criminal, or quasi-criminal, pending on March 4, 1913, but the same may be prosecuted or defended as provided by preexisting law or regulation.

heading.catch_text: Action pending March 4, 1913, unaffected by this subtitle.
